best_practices: Focus on acquiring links from domains with DA > 40
Monitor DA trends of linking domains
Diversify DA ranges across backlink profile

recommendations.low_da: Focus on acquiring backlinks from higher authority domains (DA > 40) to improve overall link quality.
recommendations.da_improvement: Current domain authority profile shows room for improvement. Target authoritative industry websites.
recommendations.excellent_da: Maintain strong domain authority profile by continuing to acquire high-quality backlinks.

best_practices: Ensure linking pages are topically relevant
Focus on thematic relationship between sites

recommendations.low_relevance: Improve backlink relevance by targeting industry-specific websites and relevant content pages.
recommendations.medium_relevance: Enhance topical authority by focusing on more closely related industry websites.
recommendations.good_relevance: Maintain strong topical relevance in backlink acquisition strategy.

best_practices: Mix of dofollow and nofollow links
Multiple page types as link sources

recommendations.low_diversity: Diversify link types by acquiring links from different sources and contexts.
recommendations.overoptimized: Reduce over-optimization by varying anchor text and link contexts.
recommendations.good_mix: Maintain healthy mix of different link types and contexts.

recommendations.limited_sources: Expand link sources to include more diverse website types and categories.
recommendations.good_variation: Continue maintaining diverse link sources while focusing on quality.

recommendations.slow_growth: Implement more active link building strategies while maintaining natural growth patterns.
recommendations.unnatural_pattern: Adjust link acquisition rate to appear more natural and steady.
recommendations.healthy_growth: Maintain current organic link growth pattern.

recommendations.low_velocity: Increase link building efforts while maintaining natural acquisition patterns.
recommendations.high_velocity: Moderate link acquisition rate to maintain natural growth pattern.

best_practices: Monitor spam score of linking domains

recommendations.high_spam: Take immediate action to disavow low-quality links and improve overall profile quality.
recommendations.moderate_spam: Review and disavow suspicious links while focusing on quality acquisition.
recommendations.low_spam: Maintain current quality control measures in link acquisition.
